description: Rehabilitation and conversion of blocks M and N (Phase 6) York Way Court to provide (Block N) 10 two bedroom flats  1 three bedroom flat  1 four bedroom flat and 1 six bedroom flat and (Block M) 24 two bedroom flats 2 three bedroom flats and 2 four bedroom flats and associated elevational alterations. Applicant's Plan Nos.: 8715/B01-B09 B20-B28 CP20B CP01
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 41(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971.
